title: Why Another Jekyllin' Website?
content:
Learning web design?

Get ready to be schooled

Modelling a website is no mean feat, and it's often useful to go back and check the html spec from time to time as it updates. This is especially important when you're going for an informative tone. This site seeks to model a text heavy informative website (like a blog) while also utilizing many of the current available HTML features. We'll also create a small but sensible set of styling instructions in CSS and a couple of handy but optional JS features.
